data.title: Neal Stephenson
data.meta_description: The personal website of author Neal Stephenson, unless it's been hacked.
data.text:
THE BIG U

My first published novel, written on a borrowed typewriter in a steaming hot garret in Iowa City while sucking down lukewarm Pickett's. Originally a "loose and baggy monster," it was beaten into some semblance of publishable condition by my first editor, Gary Fisketjon, and published with a suitably lurid cover that still makes me laugh when I see it at book signings. But it entitled me to say that I was a published novelist, and it marks the beginning of my career and my adult life.
